website_summaries.verdict: A sports-inspired fashion sneaker, the Adidas VS Pace grips many shoppers with its lean, streamlined silhouette that looks almost too sharp. Adidas endorses this as a dependable, comfortable, all-around casual sneaker for everyday wear.This sneaker appears well-crafted, pretty sleek, with minimalistic stitching details and impressively discrete double-faced styling. It has the stitched-on Three Stripes on its outer side, the perforated Three Stripes on the other (similar to the Stan Smiths). A truly fantastic bargain sneaker.
pros: The majority of customers like how stylish, smart, and decent the Adidas VS Pace looks
Many shoppers reckon it has high quality for its humble price point
More than a handful of wearers find it to be very comfortable
This pair is lightweight, a few have shared
Quite a couple of users have added that its design is so versatile in that it easily matches any attire and fits any occasion
Some wearers rave about the sole’s distinctive coloring, about how it stands out and turns the heads of many onlookers
Based on most reviews, a good handful of buyers have given the VS Pace as a gift to their beloved
Its leather upper is easy to wipe and clean, according to one user
cons: The midsole is flat and has neither cushioning nor arch support, according to some wearers
A pair of customers report that the leather upper of Adidas VS Pace has no ventilation
A few testers feel the synthetic leather upper to be stiff

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is my issue with buying sneakers on Amazon. I've got weird sized feet, so I always ha e to try on pair after pair. I didn't think these would be so ridged. They're almost like skate shoes, in that they're very flat bottomed. Apart from that, they look alright and I'm sure I'll get used to them. I'm 9.5 in every other trainer, but in these they're s little bit too big. I think 9 would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Watson

customer_reviews.title: All-round happy with these!
customer_reviews.text: A modern take on a timeless, classic style from Adidas. As expected, the shoes feature a simple yet elegant design that pairs well with various outfits/styles. I've only worn them a few times so far, but have found them to be very comfortable and fitted well with more than enough room to wiggle my toes, too! :)
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Stylish light shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish shoes, comfortable and lightweight . The laces are an issue they come loose too quickly but otherwise happy it does seem to be a legitimate product so happy with that.
customer_reviews.author: Moin

customer_reviews.title: Ace product from Adidas.
customer_reviews.text: Always like Adidas footwear and these are no exception. Very comfortable and stylish. Light yet with a sturdiness about them. Very smart-looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: These arrived quickly. They are exactly as shown on the site image and fit well. I'm very pleased with the shoes and recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with dirty mark
customer_reviews.text: Trainers are the ones I ordered however, I ordered new in box and they have came with a big dirty mark on the front of the shoe as if they are either ex-display or have been returned. I bought these as a gift for someone, so it's not acceptable. Products should be checked before being sent.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Love these trainers
customer_reviews.text: Nice trainers. Size true to fit. Brilliant value for money
customer_reviews.author: M.j

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Had these in all different colours many many times ...they are good valve for money
customer_reviews.author: craig blackburn

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: very nice trainers bought the grey ones aswell very happy a good buy
customer_reviews.author: scott goldie

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: One size has no white stripes which I didn't note before receiving them but they look good anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. Good quality and comfortable. Arrived quickly. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Claire G

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: Great fast delivery Excellent quality Will be buying from again Very happy😊
customer_reviews.author: David Storer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The sole in one of the trainers wasn’t fitted correctly therefore very disappointed in the poor quality of this product
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S K Watson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and nasty
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised this is am Adidas product. Very poor fit, poor quality and stripes on one side no Adidas logo. See them before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Amazon gift card
customer_reviews.text: Received a card so thought I’d use it on something i do not usually go for !! Fit a treat stylish just need to keep them that way lol
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Woods

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: As a single working parent, good value for money, true to size and a happy son.
customer_reviews.author: Debs

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday present
customer_reviews.text: Birthday present for my partner he loves them and says his feet are much warmer in them than other runners he owns
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ann Humphreys

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Vs Pace Sneaker
product_meta.description: The comfortable sneakers from adidas have a reinforced and padded shaft and a practical lacing. The padded insole ensures maximum comfort.
feature_bullets: Classic skater look, synthetic nubuck upper, comfortable textile lining, lightweight feel, 3-Stripes on the side
